document.full_text: yemeni president ali abdullah saleh blamed an 'outlaw gang' among his tribal enemies for a shelling attack on a mosque in the presidential compound that slightly injured him and several aides and killed seven people.
document.title: yemen's saleh injured in shelling, seven killed
lines_and_colors: yemeni president ali abdullah saleh blamed an 'outlaw gang' among his tribal enemies for a shelling attack on a mosque in the presidential compound that slightly injured him and several aides and killed seven people.
